column1: Baby Barnaby's////Plan on waiting about 30 minutes before you get seated if you arrive during meal time.  Since there is no hostess
column2: do sign on yourself in on the waiting list hanging on the pole by the entrance door; otherwise
column3: plan on fasting!  This place is really cozy and situated in the middle of neighborhood (very interesting zoning).  We tried the green eggs
column5: and migas.  Their hash brown and corned beef is served on a hot plate and we found it to be really exceptional.  Service is very efficient and friendly.  I will definitely come back to visit this place!
